description: Percentage of people with severe disabilities aged 15 to 64¹ who can use public transport unaided and without difficulty
remark: ¹   Resident population living in private households A confidence interval informs about the precision of results of sample surveys. The interval contains the true value with a probability of 95%. Last update:  19.12.2024 Source: FSO – Swiss Health Survey (SHS) © FSO 2024
